alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 12:54PM EDT until June 16 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 145 PM EDT. * At 1254 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 19 miles east of St. Marks to 21 miles southwest of Perry to 34 miles west of Steinhatchee, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Perry, Steinhatchee, Pinland, Tennille, Hells Half Acre, Jug Island, Clara, Cabbage Grove, Scanlon, Dekle Beach, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, Hampton Springs, Cedar Island, Fish Creek, Goose Pasture, Howell Place and Secotan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
